label: 蘭陵王
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: Also Ranryōō," "Ryōō." A solo dance usually performed by a child. The elaborate costume included a golden baton and a fierce gold mask surmounted by a dragon. McCullough and McCullough 1980: 240."
